title: project katarinas arm
body:
idk if this bug is on any other skins but i know its on her project skin, when ever you do your ctrl  2 taunt her right arm moves out of its socket and kinda floats with only a piece of skin connecting it to her body but then moves back into place after the taunt is over. 
nothing gamebreaking but its just a little model glitch thats kind of gross to look at lol.
